ComicInfo.Title: Crusade
ComicInfo.Summary: Crusade: Union continues to try his hand at being a super hero in New York. He investigates a disturbance in the clouds and discovers his best friend from back home (namely, the planet of Aegena) battling the powerful Crusade. When Crusade kills Serren and escapes, Union vows vengeance.
ComicInfo.Colorist: Steve Buccellato,Wendy Fouts,Electric Crayon,Steve Buccellato,Wendy Fouts,Electric Crayon
